short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write your notes without any permission

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Simple Note Extension for Chrome

Features
  -  Easy to Use
  -  Export your notes into plain text file
  -  Your notes never will delete after closing the Chrome browser
  -  It does not any kind of permissions
